notes:
This dataset includes an [OpenStreetMap](http://www.openstreetmap.org) extracts for POIs in Haiti. Also see the [Haiti OpenStreetMap extract, Buildings](https://data.hdx.rwlabs.org/dataset/haiti-openstreetmap-extract-buildings) and [Haiti OpenStreetMap extract, Roads](https://data.hdx.rwlabs.org/dataset/haiti-openstreetmap-extract-pois) datasets on HDX.

The shapefiles include all building features in the OpenStreetMap database for Haiti, including the following tags:

- [amenity=*](http://wiki.openstreetmap.org/wiki/Key:amenity)
- [man_made=*](http://wiki.openstreetmap.org/wiki/Key:man_made)
- [shop=*](http://wiki.openstreetmap.org/wiki/Key:shop)

See the [Humanitarian OpenStreetMap Team](http://hotosm.org/) website for more information on the response.
